title: Black screen while entering loading screen
body: Was about to enter a game after a couple weeks of not playing and of course there was a problem of some sort to stop me in my path. Once everyone picked their champion, I was waiting at loading screen for a good while, and it was just black. Nothing there, literally a black screen. I tried to ctrl+alt+dlt to get myself out and eventually my team just did a remake. Can someone help me out with this?

replies.body: Your network may have lost connection here and left you behind.  This black screen happens if you fail to download assets and get into the game server.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, but be sure to test it in a custom first.  I hope that helps!
Even if he lost his connection briefly, why doesn't the game re-ask for those lost IP packets/game assets automatically when the connection is back up again?
